==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|らん|ざつ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From ''ran'' ([[乱]], [[disordered]], [[confused]], [[chaotic]]) + ''zatsu'' ([[雑]], [[mixed]] up, [[disorderly]], [[confused]])

===Adjectival noun===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|らんざつ}}

# [[disorderly]], [[confused]], [[pell-mell]]

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|らんざつ}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|らんざつ}}

# [[disorder]], [[confusion]]
# [[clutter]], [[muddle]]
# [[affray]]
# [[promiscuity]]
